@dev updates the address of the SIGH Distribution Handler Contract (Manages the SIGH Speeds)
@param _SIGHStaking the new lending pool liquidation manager address*
nodes.name: setSIGHStakingImpl

nodes.documentation:
@dev the functions below are storing specific addresses that are outside the context of the protocol
hence the upgradable proxy pattern is not used*
nodes.name: getPriceOracle
updateImplInternal

devdoc.author: Aave, SIGH Finance*

getFeeProvider().details: returns the address of the FeeProvider proxy
getFeeProvider().return: the address of the Fee provider proxy*

getLendingPool().details: returns the address of the LendingPool proxy

getLendingPoolConfigurator().details: returns the address of the LendingPoolConfigurator proxy
getLendingPoolConfigurator().return: the lending pool configurator proxy address*

getLendingPoolCore().details: returns the address of the LendingPoolCore proxy
getLendingPoolCore().return: the lending pool core proxy address

getLendingPoolDataProvider().details: returns the address of the LendingPoolDataProvider proxy
getLendingPoolDataProvider().return: the lending pool data provider proxy address

getLendingPoolLiquidationManager().details: returns the address of the LendingPoolLiquidationManager. Since the manager is used through delegateCall within the LendingPool contract, the proxy contract pattern does not work properly hence the addresses are changed directly.
getLendingPoolLiquidationManager().return: the address of the Lending pool liquidation manager*

getLendingPoolParametersProvider().details: returns the address of the LendingPoolParametersProvider proxy
getLendingPoolParametersProvider().return: the address of the Lending pool parameters provider proxy*

getPriceOracle().details: the functions below are storing specific addresses that are outside the context of the protocol hence the upgradable proxy pattern is not used*

getSIGHFinanceConfigurator().details: returns the address of the SIGHFinanceConfigurator proxy
getSIGHFinanceConfigurator().return: the SIGH Finance configurator proxy address*

setFeeProviderImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the FeeProvider proxy

params._feeProvider: the new lending pool fee provider implementation*

setLendingPoolConfiguratorImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the lending pool configurator

params._configurator: the new lending pool configurator implementation*

setLendingPoolCoreImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the lending pool core

params._lendingPoolCore: the new lending pool core implementation*

setLendingPoolDataProviderImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the lending pool data provider

params._provider: the new lending pool data provider implementation*

setLendingPoolImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the lending pool

setLendingPoolLiquidationManager(address.details: updates the address of the Lending pool liquidation manager

params._manager: the new lending pool liquidation manager address*

setLendingPoolParametersProviderImpl(add.details: updates the implementation of the lending pool parameters provider

params._parametersProvider: the new lending pool parameters provider implementation*

setSIGHFinanceConfiguratorImpl(address).details: updates the implementation of the lending pool configurator

params._configurator: the new lending pool configurator implementation*

setSIGHMechanismHandlerImpl(address).details: updates the address of the SIGH Distribution Handler Contract (Manages the SIGH Speeds)

params._SIGHMechanismHandler: the new SIGH Distribution Handler (Impl) Address*

setSIGHStakingImpl(address).details: updates the address of the SIGH Distribution Handler Contract (Manages the SIGH Speeds)

params._SIGHStaking: the new lending pool liquidation manager address*

setSIGHTreasuryImpl(address).details: updates the address of the SIGH Treasury Contract

params._SIGHTreasury: the new SIGH Treasury Contract address*

devdoc.title: GlobalAddressesProvider contract (Taken from Aave, Modified by SIGH Finance)

userdoc.notice: Is the main registry of the protocol. All the different components of the protocol are accessible through the addresses provider.
